00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board.h"
00031 #include "ht32_board_config.h"
00032 
00033 #include "buzzer_pwm.h"
00034 
00035 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00036   * @{
00037   */
00038 
00039 /** @addtogroup TM_Examples TM
00040   * @{
00041   */
00042 
00043 /** @addtogroup PWM_Buzzer
00044   * @{
00045   */
00046 
00047 
00048 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 void Buzzer_Fun1(void);
00050 void Buzzer_Fun2(void);
00051 void Buzzer_PlayTable(void);
00052 
00053 /* Global variables ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00054 u16 gBee_Scale[] =
00055 {
00056     0,
00057   262,  294,  330,  349,  392,  440,  494,
00058   523,  587,  659,  698,  784,  880,  988,
00059  1046, 1175, 1318, 1397, 1568, 1760, 1976
00060 };
00061 
00062 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00063 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00064   * @brief  Main program.
00065   * @retval None
00066   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00067 int main(void)
00068 {
00069   Buzzer_Fun1();
00070 
00071   Buzzer_Fun2();
00072 
00073   Buzzer_Init(0);
00074 
00075   while (1)
00076   {
00077     Buzzer_PlayTable();
00078   }
00079 }
00080 
00081 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00082   * @brief  Buzzer function 1.
00083   * @retval None
00084   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00085 void Buzzer_Fun1(void)
00086 {
00087   /* Bee 4 times, 3 kHz, active 50 ms, inactive 50 ms                                                       */
00088   Buzzer_Init(0);
00089   Buzzer_Start(4, 3000, 50, 50);
00090   while (Buzzer_IsFinish() == FALSE);
00091 }
00092 
00093 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00094   * @brief  Buzzer function 2.
00095   * @retval None
00096   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00097 void Buzzer_Fun2(void)
00098 {
00099   /* Bee 2 times, 800 Hz, active 1000 ms, inactive 500 ms                                                   */
00100   Buzzer_Init(0);
00101   Buzzer_Start(2, 800, 1000, 500);
00102   while (Buzzer_IsFinish() == FALSE);
00103 }
00104 
00105 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00106   * @brief  Buzzer play table function.
00107   * @retval None
00108   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00109 void Buzzer_PlayTable(void)
00110 {
00111   static u32 i = 1;
00112 
00113   /* Bee 1 times, gBee_Scale[i] Hz, active 250 ms, inactive 250 ms                                          */
00114   if (Buzzer_IsFinish() == TRUE && i <= 21)
00115   {
00116     Buzzer_Start(1, gBee_Scale[i], 250, 250);
00117     i++;
00118   }
00119 }
00120 
00121 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)

00123   * @brief  Report both the error name of the source file and the source line number.
00124   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00125   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00126   * @retval None
00127   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00128 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00129 {
00130   /*
00131      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00132      Debug message can be added here.
00133      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00134   */
00135 
00136   while (1)
00137   {
00138   }
00139 }
00140 #endif
